meanings.definition: A person skilled in a particular craft or trade, especially one involving manual work.
meanings.sent1: The group of handicraftsmen showcased their handmade pottery at the local fair.
meanings.sent2: The handicraftsmen in the village were known for their intricate wood carvings.
meanings.sent3: The handicraftsmen decided to have a friendly competition to see who could make the tiniest sculpture.
meanings.sent4: In the world of creativity, handicraftsmen are the magicians who bring imagination to life.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of the ancient handicraftsmen continues to inspire new generations of artisans.

meanings.definition: The collective term for skilled workers who create items by hand.
meanings.sent1: The market was filled with stalls run by talented handicraftsmen selling their unique creations.
meanings.sent2: Handicraftsmen from different cultures gathered to exchange ideas and techniques.
meanings.sent3: The group of handicraftsmen formed a guild to support each other in their craft.
meanings.sent4: In a world of mass production, the work of handicraftsmen stands out as a labor of love.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs made by skilled handicraftsmen are truly works of art.
